markdownRemark.html:
You need to test your goddamn code. But that's easier said than done. First, we have to make sure that we're writing testable code. Well, what does that mean?

Writing testable code

Your code is ugly. But im not gonna rub it in your face. Let's start by talking about deterministic vs non-deterministic code. How the hell do you expect to test a non-deterministic function. You can't!

Write better code, jeez.

Summary

At this point you should have deleted your code, smashed your hard drive with a hammer and thrown it off a bridge. If you haven't you're doing the world a great disservice.
